title: Cormoran Strike Series Robert Galbraith 5 Books Collection Set
description: 'The work of a master storyteller' Daily TelegraphRobert Galbraith's Strike novels are some of the finest examples of detective fiction of our age. The series has sold well over a million copies in the UK alone, and has been adapted into a highly successful television series for the BBC.For the first time, readers can purchase all five paperbacks in the series in this exquisite deluxe box set. The Cuckoo's CallingThe SilkwormCareer of EvilLethal WhiteTroubled BloodPRAISE FOR THE STRIKE SERIES'Magnificent' Sunday Times'One of crime's most engaging duos' Guardian'Reminds me why I fell in love with crime fiction in the first place' Val McDermid'One of the most unique and compelling detectives I've come across in years' Mark Billingham'Superbly constructed' Daily Mail
author: Robert Galbraith
